SELECT guid guid$$, viewfk viewfk$$, (select c.classname from ma_class c where c.guid = a.viewclassguid) viewfk$$classname, a.viewclassguid viewfk$$classguid, end2$$class end2$$classguid, end2$$master end2$$masterfk, end2 end2$$, DATASEQ, quantity, uom, rsflag, createtime createtime$$, createuser createuser$$, updatetime updatetime$$, updateuser updateuser$$, classguid classguid$$ FROM $TABLENAME$ a
and a.viewfk = #VIEWFK#
and a.end2 = #END2#
and a.end2$$master = #END2MASTERFK#

select case when t.isincorporatedmaster = '0' then (select case when count(b.end2$$master) > 1 then 'Y' else 'N' end from $TABLENAME$ b where b.viewfk = #VIEWGUID# and b.end2$$master = #END2MASTERGUID#) else 'N' end isRepeat from bi_bom_template t where t.templateid = #BOMTEMPLATEID# and rownum = 1
